description.en:
Event fired after the page index is changed , but before grid data rebinds
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
   Use ui.pageIndex to get current page index.
description.jp:
Event fired after the page index is changed , but before grid data rebinds
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
   Use ui.pageIndex to get current page index.

description.en:
Event fired before the page index is changed.
   Return false in order to cancel page index changing.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
   Use ui.currentPageIndex to get current page index.
   Use ui.newPageIndex to get new page index.
description.jp:
Event fired before the page index is changed.
   Return false in order to cancel page index changing.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
   Use ui.currentPageIndex to get current page index.
   Use ui.newPageIndex to get new page index.

description.en:
Event fired after the pager footer is rendered
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
   Use ui.dataSource to get reference to grid's data source.
description.jp:
Event fired after the pager footer is rendered
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
   Use ui.dataSource to get reference to grid's data source.

description.en:
Event fired before the pager footer is rendered (the whole area below the grid records).
   Return false in order to cancel pager footer rendering.   
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
   Use ui.dataSource to get reference to grid's data source.
description.jp:
Event fired before the pager footer is rendered (the whole area below the grid records).
   Return false in order to cancel pager footer rendering.   
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
   Use ui.dataSource to get reference to grid's data source.

description.en:
Event fired after the page size is changed from the page size dropdown.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
   Use ui.pageSize to get current page size.
description.jp:
Event fired after the page size is changed from the page size dropdown.
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
   Use ui.pageSize to get current page size.

description.en:
Event fired when the page size is about to be changed from the page size dropdown.
   Return false in order to cancel page size changing.   
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
   Use ui.currentPageSize to get current page size.
   Use ui.newPageSize to get new page size.
description.jp:
Event fired when the page size is about to be changed from the page size dropdown.
   Return false in order to cancel page size changing.   
   Function takes arguments evt and ui.
   Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging.
   Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.
   Use ui.currentPageSize to get current page size.
   Use ui.newPageSize to get new page size.

description.en: leading label for the dropdown from where the page index can be switched
description.jp: leading label for the dropdown from where the page index can be switched

description.en: custom localized tooltip for the page index dropdown
description.jp: custom localized tooltip for the page index dropdown

description.en: localized trailing label for the dropdown from where the page index can be switched
description.jp: localized trailing label for the dropdown from where the page index can be switched

description.en: current page index that's bound and rendered in the UI
description.jp: current page index that's bound and rendered in the UI

description.en: dropdown width for page size and page index dropdowns
description.jp: dropdown width for page size and page index dropdowns

description.en: Time in milliseconds for which page dropdown will wait for keystrokes before changing the page.
description.jp: Time in milliseconds for which page dropdown will wait for keystrokes before changing the page.

description.en: localized text for the first page label
description.jp: localized text for the first page label

description.en: custom localized tooltip for the first. page button
description.jp: custom localized tooltip for the first. page button

description.en: localized text for the last page label
description.jp: localized text for the last page label

description.en: custom localized tooltip for the last. page button
description.jp: custom localized tooltip for the last. page button

description.en: localized text for the next page label
description.jp: localized text for the next page label

description.en: custom localized tooltip for the next. page button
description.jp: custom localized tooltip for the next. page button

description.en: sets gets the number of pages which if exceeded a drop down list of page indices is displayed. If the number of pages is less than or equal to this option then page buttons are displayed.
description.jp: sets gets the number of pages which if exceeded a drop down list of page indices is displayed. If the number of pages is less than or equal to this option then page buttons are displayed.

description.en: denotes the name of the encoded URL parameter that will state what is the currently requested page index
description.jp: denotes the name of the encoded URL parameter that will state what is the currently requested page index

description.en: custom pager records label template - in jQuery templating style and syntax
description.jp: custom pager records label template - in jQuery templating style and syntax

description.en: custom localized tooltip for the pager records label
description.jp: custom localized tooltip for the pager records label

description.en: default number of records per page
description.jp: default number of records per page

description.en: label rendered in front of the page size dropdown
description.jp: label rendered in front of the page size dropdown

description.en: Gets or sets the location of the drop down for page size
description.jp: Gets or sets the location of the drop down for page size

description.en: The drop down will be rendered above the grid header
description.jp: The drop down will be rendered above the grid header

description.en: The drop down will be rendered next to page links
description.jp: The drop down will be rendered next to page links

description.en: custom localized tooltip for the page size dropdown
description.jp: custom localized tooltip for the page size dropdown

description.en: Trailing label for the page size dropdown
description.jp: Trailing label for the page size dropdown

description.en: Default: [5, 10, 20, 25, 50, 75, 100]. contents of the page size dropdown indicating what preconfigured page sizes are available to the end user
description.jp: Default: [5, 10, 20, 25, 50, 75, 100]. contents of the page size dropdown indicating what preconfigured page sizes are available to the end user

description.en: denotes the name of the encoded URL parameter that will state what is the currently requested page size
description.jp: denotes the name of the encoded URL parameter that will state what is the currently requested page size

description.en: custom localized format string for tooltips of buttons that directly jump to a particular page. The format string follows the jQuery templating style and syntax. See also the pageCountLimit option.
description.jp: custom localized format string for tooltips of buttons that directly jump to a particular page. The format string follows the jQuery templating style and syntax. See also the pageCountLimit option.

description.en: localized text for the prev page label
description.jp: localized text for the prev page label

description.en: custom localized tooltip for the prev. page button
description.jp: custom localized tooltip for the prev. page button

description.en: the property in the response that will hold the total number of records in the data source
description.jp: the property in the response that will hold the total number of records in the data source

description.en: option specifying whether to render the first and last page buttons
description.jp: option specifying whether to render the first and last page buttons

description.en: option specifying whether to show summary label for the currently rendered records or not
description.jp: option specifying whether to show summary label for the currently rendered records or not

description.en: if false, a dropdown allowing to change the page size will not be rendered in the UI
description.jp: if false, a dropdown allowing to change the page size will not be rendered in the UI

description.en: option specifying whether to render the previous and next page buttons
description.jp: option specifying whether to render the previous and next page buttons

description.en: request
description.jp: request

description.en: paging on the client-side
description.jp: paging on the client-side

description.en: number of pages that are constantly visible. For the invisible pages, prev and next buttons are used
description.jp: number of pages that are constantly visible. For the invisible pages, prev and next buttons are used
